column1: Uchi////Hot Items: They have a good twist on some sweet + tangy fried chicken
column2: but I wouldn't have ordered it at a pricey place like this; I'd just go to H-Mart and get that twice fried fried chicken in the pizza boxes =) Â However
column3: they did have this searing pot of rice
column6: and an egg where they pour a sauce and cook it at the table which was a pretty good take on a Japanese version of BiBimBap
